1.verse_text: These are the wise words of Solomon son of David. Solomon was king of Israel.

They teach wisdom and self-control. They give understanding. They will teach you what is honest and fair and right. They give knowledge and good sense to the young. Even they can find good advice in these words. They will understand the words of wise men and their riddles. But foolish people hate wisdom and discipline. And do not forget your mother"s advice. It will be like flowers in your hair or a chain around your neck. But do not follow them. Let"s ambush and kill someone. Let"s attack some harmless person just for fun. Let"s swallow them whole, as the grave does. We will fill our houses with what we steal. and we will share with you what we steal.' Do not do what they do. They are quick to kill. right where the birds can see it! They will only catch themselves! Greed takes away the life of the greedy person. She raises her voice in the city squares. She makes her speech at the city gates: How long will you make fun of wisdom? How long will you hate knowledge? I will tell you what"s in my heart. I will tell you what I am thinking. I held out my hand, but you paid no attention. You did not want me to correct you. I will make fun when disaster happens to you. Trouble will strike you like a whirlwind. Pain and trouble will overwhelm you. But I will not answer. You will look for me. But you will not find me. You did not choose to respect the Lord. You rejected my correction. You will get what you planned for others. They are destroyed because they do not care. They will be safe, without fear of being hurt.'
They will teach you how to be wise and self-controlled.
They give the ability to think to those with little knowledge.
Wise people should also listen to them and learn even more.
Then they will be able to understand wise words and stories.
Knowledge begins with respect for the Lord.
My child, listen to your father"s teaching.
Their teaching will beautify your life.
My child, sinners will try to lead you into sin.
They might say, 'Come with us.
Let"s swallow them alive, as death does.
We will take all kinds of valuable things.
Come join us,
My child, do not go along with them.
They run to do evil.
It is useless to spread out a net
These men are setting their own trap.
All greedy people end up this way.
Wisdom is like a good woman who shouts in the street.
She cries out in the noisy street.
'You foolish people! How long do you want to stay foolish?
Listen when I correct you.
I called, but you refused to listen.
You did not follow my advice.
So I will laugh when you are in trouble.
Disaster will come over you like a storm.
'Then you will call out to me.
You rejected knowledge.
You did not accept my advice.
So you will get what you deserve.
Fools wander away and get killed.
But those who listen to me will live in safety.

2.verse_text: My child, believe what I say. And remember what I command you. Try with all your heart to gain understanding. Beg for understanding. Hunt for it like hidden treasure. Then you will begin to know God. Knowledge and understanding come from him. Like a shield he protects those who are innocent. He protects those who are loyal to him. You will understand what is good to do. And knowledge will be pleasing to you. Understanding will guard you. It will save you from people whose words are bad. They do what is evil. They are happy to do what is crooked and evil. Their ways are dishonest. who tries to lead you into adultery with pleasing words. They forget the promise they made before God. What she does leads to death. He will not continue to live. It will help you do what is right. Those who are innocent will remain in it. The unfaithful will be thrown out of it.
Listen to wisdom.
Cry out for wisdom.
Search for it as you would for silver.
Then you will understand what it means to respect the Lord.
Only the Lord gives wisdom.
He stores up wisdom for those who are honest.
He guards those who are fair to others.
Then you will understand what is honest and fair and right.
You will have wisdom in your heart.
Good sense will protect you.
It will keep you from doing evil.
Such people do not do what is right.
They enjoy doing wrong.
What they do is wrong.
It will save you from the unfaithful wife
Such women leave the husbands they married when they were young.
If you go to her house, you are on your way to death.
No one who goes to her comes back.
But wisdom will help you be a good person.
Those who are honest will stay in the land.
But evil people will be removed from the land.

3.verse_text: My child, do not forget my teaching. Keep my commands in mind. And your life will be successful. Let kindness and truth show in all you do. Write them down in your mind as if on a tablet. and pleasing to both God and men. Don"t depend on your own understanding. And he will give you success. Respect the Lord and refuse to do wrong. And your bones will be strong. Give him the firstfruits from all your crops. And your wine barrels will overflow with new wine. And don"t become angry when he corrects you. just as a father corrects the child that he likes. And happy is the person who gets understanding. It brings more profit than gold. Nothing you want is equal to it. With her left hand she gives you riches and honor. It will bring you peace. Everyone who uses wisdom will be happy. Using his understanding, he set the sky in place. And he made the clouds drop rain on the earth. Don"t let them out of your sight! Like a necklace, they will beautify your life. And you will not get hurt. When you lie down, your sleep will be peaceful. You won"t need to fear the ruin that comes to the wicked. He will keep you from being trapped. do good to people who need help. don"t say to him, 'Come back later. I will give it to you tomorrow.' He lives nearby and trusts you. Don"t accuse him if he has not harmed you. And don"t choose to be like them. But he is a friend to those who are honest. But he will bless the home of people who do what is right. But he is kind to those who are not proud. But foolish people will be disgraced.
Then you will live a long time.
Don"t ever stop being kind and truthful.
Then you will be respected
Trust the Lord with all your heart.
Remember the Lord in everything you do.
Don"t depend on your own wisdom.
Then your body will be healthy.
Honor the Lord by giving him part of your wealth.
Then your barns will be full.
My child, do not reject the Lord"s discipline.
The Lord corrects those he loves,
Happy is the person who finds wisdom.
Wisdom is worth more than silver.
Wisdom is more precious than rubies.
With her right hand wisdom offers you a long life.
Wisdom will make your life pleasant.
As a tree makes fruit, wisdom gives life to those who use it.
Using his wisdom, the Lord made the earth.
Using his knowledge, he made rivers flow from underground springs.
My child, hold on to wisdom and reason.
They will give you life.
Then you will go on your way in safety.
You won"t need to be afraid when you lie down.
You won"t need to be afraid of trouble coming suddenly.
The Lord will keep you safe.
Whenever you are able,
If you have what your neighbor asks for,
Don"t make plans to hurt your neighbor.
Don"t accuse a man for no good reason.
Don"t be jealous of men who use violence.
The Lord hates those who do wrong.
The Lord will put a curse on the evil person"s house.
The Lord laughs at those who laugh at him.
Wise people will receive honor.

4.verse_text: My children, listen to your father"s teaching. Pay attention so you will understand. Do not forget what I teach you. I was like an only child to my mother. 'Hold on to my words with all your heart. Keep my commands and you will live. Don"t forget or ignore my words. Love wisdom, and it will keep you safe. If it costs everything you have, get understanding. Use it, and it will bring honor to you. Like a crown, it will make you look beautiful.' Then you will have a long life. And I am leading you to do what is right. You will not be overwhelmed. Don"t let go of it. Keep safe all that you have learned. It is the most important thing in your life. Don"t do what evil people do. Stay away from them and keep on going. They cannot rest until they hurt someone. as if they were eating bread and drinking wine. It grows brighter and brighter until it is full daylight. They can"t even see what has hurt them. Listen closely to what I say. Keep them deep within your heart. They bring health to the whole body. Your thoughts run your life. Don"t ever say things that are not true. Keep looking straight ahead to what is good. Always do what is right. Stay away from evil.
What I am telling you is good.
I was once a young boy in my father"s house.
And my father taught me and said,
Get wisdom and understanding.
Use wisdom, and it will take care of you.
Wisdom is the most important thing. So get wisdom.
Believe in the value of wisdom, and it will make you great.
Like flowers in your hair, it will beautify your life.
My child, listen and accept what I say.
I am guiding you in wisdom.
Nothing will hold you back.
Always remember what you have been taught.
Don"t follow the ways of the wicked.
Avoid their ways. Don"t go near what they do.
They cannot sleep until they do evil.
They fill themselves with wickedness and cruelty
The way of the good person is like the light of dawn.
But the wicked are like those who stumble in the dark.
My child, pay attention to my words.
Don"t ever forget my words.
These words are the secret to life for those who find them.
Be very careful about what you think.
Don"t use your mouth to tell lies.
Keep your eyes focused on what is right.
Be careful what you do.
Do not do anything unless it is right.

5.verse_text: My son, pay attention to my wisdom. Listen to my words of understanding. Watch what you say. Her words may be as pleasant as olive oil. She will cause you pain like a two-edged sword. Her steps are headed straight to the grave. She does not know that her ways are wrong. Don"t ignore what I say. Don"t even go near the door of her house. And the best years of your life will be given to someone who is cruel. And what you worked so hard for will go to someone else. Then your health will be gone. I would not listen when I was corrected! I paid no attention to what they taught me. in front of a whole group of people.' She is like your own well of water from which you drink. flowing in the city streets or squares. So be satisfied with your wife, not those outside your home. Don"t share them with strangers. you married when you were young. She gives you joys as your fountain gives you water. Let her love always make you happy. Let her love always hold you captive. Don"t hold another man"s wife. He watches where you go. He will be tied up by his sins as if they were ropes. He will be held captive by his own foolishness.
Be careful to use good sense.
The words of another man"s wife may seem sweet as honey.
But in the end she will bring you sorrow.
She is on the way to death.
She gives no thought to life.
Now, my sons, listen to me.
Stay away from such a woman.
If you do, you will give your riches to others.
Strangers will enjoy your wealth.
You will groan at the end of your life.
Then you will say, 'I hated self-control!
I would not listen to my teachers.
I have come very close to being completely ruined
Be faithful to your own wife.
You wouldn"t drink from streams
These things are yours alone.
Be happy with the wife
She is as lovely and graceful as a deer.
My son, don"t be held captive by a woman who takes part in adultery.
The Lord sees everything you do.
An evil man will be caught in his evil ways.
He will die because he does not control himself.

6.verse_text: My child, be careful about giving a guarantee for somebody else. Be careful about promising to pay what someone else owes. You might be caught by your own words. Then here is how to get free. Go to your neighbor and don"t be proud. Beg him to free you from your promise. Don"t even rest your eyes. Free yourself like a bird flying away from a trapper. Watch what they do and be wise. They have no leader or ruler. They gather their supplies at harvest. When will you get up from sleeping? You fold your hands and rest. You will have as little as if you had been held up. They go around telling lies. They make signs with their fingers. They are always causing trouble. Suddenly they will be hurt beyond cure. There are seven things he cannot stand: a lying tongue, hands that kill innocent people, feet that are quick to do evil, and a man who causes trouble among brothers. Don"t forget your mother"s teaching. Let it be as if they were tied around your neck. They will guard you while you sleep. They will speak to you when you are awake. Their teaching is like a light. And the correction that comes from them helps you have life. and from the pleasing words of another man"s unfaithful wife. Don"t let her capture you by the way she looks at you. And a woman who takes part in adultery may cost you your life. without burning your clothes. without burning your feet. Anyone who does so will be punished. when he steals because he is hungry. It may cost him everything he owns. He will destroy himself. And his shame will never go away. He will have no mercy when he gets even. He will take no money, no matter how much it is.
You might get trapped by what you say.
My child, you might do this and be under somebody"s control.
Don"t go to sleep.
But free yourself like a deer running from a hunter.
Go watch the ants, you lazy person.
Ants have no commander.
But they store up food in the summer.
How long will you lie there, you lazy person?
You sleep a little; you take a nap.
So you will be as poor as if you had been robbed.
Some people are wicked and no good.
They wink with their eyes and signal with their feet.
They make evil plans in their hearts.
So trouble will strike them in an instant.
There are six things the Lord hates.
a proud look,
a mind that thinks up evil plans,
a witness who tells lies
My son, keep your father"s commands.
Remember their words forever.
They will guide you when you walk.
Their commands are like a lamp.
Such teaching will keep you from sinful women
Don"t want her because she is beautiful.
A prostitute may leave you with only a loaf of bread.
You cannot carry hot coals against your chest
And you cannot walk on hot coals
The same thing happens if you commit adultery with another man"s wife.
People do not hate a thief
But if he is caught, he must pay back seven times what he stole.
A man who takes part in adultery doesn"t have any sense.
He will be beaten up and disgraced.
Jealousy makes a husband very angry.
He will accept no payment for the wrong.

7.verse_text: My son, remember what I say. Treasure my commands. Protect my teachings as you would your own eyes. Write them down in your mind as if on a tablet. Make understanding your closest friend. They will keep you away from the unfaithful wife and her pleasing words. I looked out through the shutters. I noticed one of them who had no wisdom. He was on the road leading to her house. The darkness of the night was just beginning. She was dressed like a prostitute and was planning to trick him. She never stayed at home. She was always waiting around on the street corners. Without shame she said to him, I have kept my special promises. I have been looking for you and have found you! with colored sheets from Egypt. with myrrh, aloes and cinnamon. Let"s enjoy each other"s love! He has gone on a long trip. And he won"t be home for weeks.' By her pleasing words she led him into doing wrong. He was like an ox being led to the butcher. He was like a deer caught in a trap. He was like a bird caught in a trap. He didn"t know what he did would kill him. Pay attention to what I say. Don"t join her in her evil actions. Many have died because of her. That road leads down to where the dead are.
Obey my commands, and you will live.
Remind yourself of them.
Be good to wisdom as if she were your sister.
Wisdom and understanding will keep you away from adultery.
I once was standing at the window of my house.
I saw some foolish, young men.
He was walking down the street near the corner.
It was the twilight of the evening.
Then the woman approached him.
She was a loud and stubborn woman.
She was always out in the streets or in the city squares.
She grabbed him and kissed him.
'I made my fellowship offering and have the meat at home.
So I have come out to meet you.
I have covered my bed
I have made my bed smell sweet
Come, let"s make love until morning.
My husband is not home.
He took a lot of money with him.
By her clever words she made him give in.
All at once he followed her.
But quickly an arrow shot through his liver.
Now, my sons, listen to me.
Don"t let yourself be tricked by the woman who is guilty of adultery.
She has ruined many good men.
Going to her house is like taking the road to death.

8.verse_text: Like a person, wisdom calls out to you. Understanding raises her voice. and at the crossroads, she stands calling. At the entrances into the city, she calls out: I am shouting to all people. You who are foolish, get understanding. What I tell you is right. I hate it when people speak evil. Nothing I say is crooked or false. People with knowledge know that my words are right. Choose knowledge rather than the finest gold. Nothing you want is equal to it. I also have knowledge and good sense. It is wise to hate pride and bragging, evil ways and lies. I have understanding and power. And rulers use me to make fair laws. So do important men and all good judges. Those who want me find me. So are wealth and lasting success. What I give is better than pure silver. I do what is fair. I fill them with treasures. This was before he made anything else long ago. even before the world began. There were no springs overflowing with water. The mountains had not even been put in place. He had not even made the first dust of the earth. when he stretched the horizon over the oceans. I was there when he put the fountains in the oceans. not to go beyond the borders he had set for it. I was there when he laid the earth"s foundation. I was happy every day and enjoyed being in his presence. And I was happy with all its people. Those who follow my ways are happy. Do not ignore it. They stand watching at my door every day. They are at my open doorway, wanting to be with me. And the Lord will be pleased with him. Those who hate me love death.'
On the hilltops along the road
She stands beside the city gates.
'People, I"m calling out to you.
You who do not know better, get the ability to think.
Listen. I have important things to say.
What I say is true.
Everything I say is honest.
People with good sense know that what I say is true.
Choose my teachings instead of silver.
Wisdom is more precious than rubies.
'I am wisdom, and I have the ability to think.
If you respect the Lord, you also will hate evil.
I have good sense and advice.
Kings use me to govern.
Princes use me to lead.
I love those who love me.
Riches and honor are mine.
What I give is better than the finest gold.
I do what is right.
I give wealth to those who love me.
'I, wisdom, was with God when he began his work.
I was appointed in the very beginning,
I began before there were oceans.
I began before the hills were there.
God still had not made the earth or fields.
I was there when God put the skies in place,
I was there when he made the clouds above.
I was there when he ordered the sea
I was like a child by his side.
I enjoyed the whole world.
'Now, my children, listen to me.
Listen to my teaching, and you will be wise.
Those who listen to me are happy.
Whoever finds me finds life.
Whoever does not find me hurts himself.

9.verse_text: Wisdom has built her house. She has made its seven columns. She has set her table. She calls out from the highest place in the city. 'Come in here, you foolish people! And drink the wine I have prepared. Be a person of understanding. If you correct an evil person, you will get hurt. But correct a wise man, and he will love you. Teach a good man, and he will learn even more. And understanding begins with knowing God, the Holy One. Wisdom will add years to your life. But a person who makes fun of wisdom will suffer for it.' She does not have wisdom or knowledge. It is at the highest place in the city. They are minding their own business. 'Come in here, you foolish people! Stolen food tastes better.' They don"t realize that her guests are deep in the grave.
She has prepared her food and wine.
She has sent out her servant girls.
She says to those who are not wise,
Stop your foolish ways, and you will live.
'If you correct someone who makes fun of wisdom, you will get insulted.
Do not correct someone who makes fun of wisdom, or he will hate you.
Teach a wise man, and he will become even wiser.
'Wisdom begins with respect for the Lord.
If you live wisely, you will live a long time.
The wise person is rewarded by his wisdom.
Foolishness is like a loud woman.
She sits at the door of her house.
She calls out to those who are passing by.
She says to those who are not wise,
But these people don"t know that everyone dies who goes there.

10.verse_text: These are the wise words of Solomon: A wise son makes his father happy. But a foolish son makes his mother sad. But right living will save you from death. But he does not let evil people get what they hunger for. But a hard worker will become rich. But the son who sleeps through the harvest is a disgrace. But the wicked will be overwhelmed by violence. But evil people will soon be forgotten. But a talkative fool will be ruined. But the one who is dishonest will be caught. And foolish talk will lead to your ruin. But the words of the wicked contain nothing but violence. But love forgives all wrongs. But people without wisdom can expect to be punished. But a foolish person talks too much and is ruined. But having no money destroys the poor. But evil people are paid back with punishment. But the person who ignores correction will be ruined. Whoever tells lies is a fool. If you are wise, you will keep quiet. But an evil person"s thoughts are worth little. But a foolish person dies because he doesn"t have wisdom. And with it comes no sorrow. But a person with understanding enjoys doing what is wise. But a good person will receive what he wants most. But a good person will always be safe. He bothers others like vinegar on the teeth or smoke in the eyes. But an evil person will have his life cut short. But an evil person can expect nothing. But he will ruin those who do evil. But evil people will not remain in the land. But a liar"s tongue will be stopped. But the wicked tell lies.
Riches gotten by doing wrong have no value.
The Lord does not let people who live right go hungry.
A lazy person will end up poor.
A son who gathers crops when they are ready is wise.
People who do what is right will have rich blessings.
Good people will be remembered as a blessing.
A wise person does what he is told.
The honest person will live safely.
A wink may get you into trouble.
Like a fountain of water, the words of a good person give life.
Hatred stirs up trouble.
You can expect wise people to speak with understanding.
Wise people don"t tell everything they know.
Having lots of money protects the rich.
Good people are rewarded with life.
The person who accepts correction is on the way to life.
Whoever hides his hate is a liar.
If you talk a lot, you are sure to sin.
The words of a good person are like pure silver.
A good person"s words will help many others.
The Lord"s blessing brings wealth.
A foolish person enjoys doing wrong.
An evil person will get what he fears most.
A storm will blow the evil person away.
A lazy person brings trouble to the one he works for.
Whoever respects the Lord will have a long life.
A good person can look forward to happiness.
The Lord will protect good people.
Good people will always be safe.
A good person says wise things.
Good people say the right thing.

11.verse_text: The Lord hates dishonest scales. But he is pleased with correct weights. It is wise not to be proud. But dishonesty will destroy those who are not trustworthy. But doing what is right will save you from dying too soon. But a wicked person will be destroyed by his wickedness. But those who are not trustworthy will be caught by their own desires. The hopes he placed in his riches will come to nothing. It comes to the wicked instead. But a good person will escape by being smart. When evil people die, there are shouts of joy. But the wicked can destroy it with their words. But a person with understanding keeps quiet. But a trustworthy person can keep a secret. But when many people give advice, it will be safe. It is safer to avoid such promises. But cruel men get wealth. But a cruel person brings trouble on himself. But a good person will surely be rewarded. But those who chase after evil will die. But he is pleased with those who are innocent. But those who do what is right will not be punished. is like a gold ring in a pig"s snout. But the hopes of the wicked will be defeated by God"s anger. But others don"t give what they should, and they end up poor. Whoever helps others will himself be helped. But they bless a person who is willing to sell it. But whoever looks for evil will find trouble. But a good person will be as healthy as a green leaf. And a foolish person will become a servant to the wise. The wise person shows others how to be wise. So the wicked and the sinners will also be punished.
Pride leads only to shame.
Good people will be guided by honesty.
Riches will not help when it"s time to die.
The goodness of an innocent person makes his life easier.
Doing what is right brings freedom to honest people.
When a wicked person dies, his hope is gone.
The good man is saved from trouble.
By his words an evil person can destroy his neighbor.
When good people succeed, the city is happy.
The influence of good people makes a city great.
A person without good sense finds fault with his neighbor.
A person who gossips can"t keep secrets.
Without leadership a nation will be defeated.
Whoever guarantees to pay what somebody else owes will suffer.
A kind woman is respected.
A kind person is doing himself a favor.
An evil person really gains nothing from what he earns.
Those who are truly good will live.
The Lord hates those with evil hearts.
You can be sure that evil people will be punished.
A beautiful woman without good sense
The wishes of those who do right will come true.
Some people give much but get back even more.
A person who gives to others will get richer.
People curse someone who keeps all the grain for himself.
Whoever looks for good will find kindness.
Those who trust in riches will be ruined.
Whoever brings trouble to his family will be left with nothing but the wind.
As a tree makes fruit, a good person gives life to others.
Good people will be rewarded on earth.

12.verse_text: Anyone who loves learning accepts being corrected. But a person who hates being corrected is stupid. But he will punish anyone who plans evil. But a good person has safety and security. But a disgraceful wife is like a disease in his bones. But the advice of the wicked will trick you. But the words of good people will save them. But a good man"s family goes on. But a stupid person is not respected. He is better off than someone who acts important but has no food. But even the kindest acts of the wicked are cruel. But the one who chases useless dreams isn"t wise. But good people want to give to others. But good people stay out of trouble. And he will also be rewarded for what he does. But a wise person listens to advice. But a wise person ignores an insult. But a dishonest witness tells lies. But wise words bring healing. But lies last only a moment. But those who plan peace will be happy. But an evil person"s life is full of trouble. But he is pleased with those who do what they promise. But a foolish person shows how foolish he is. But those who are lazy will be slaves. But a kind word cheers up a person. But an evil person is easily led to do wrong. But a hard worker will have great wealth. But there is another way that leads to death.
The Lord is pleased with a good person.
Doing evil brings a person no safety at all.
A good wife is like a crown for her husband.
The plans that good people make are fair.
The wicked talk of killing people.
Wicked people die and leave nothing behind.
A wise person is praised.
A person might not be important but still have a servant.
A good man takes care of his animals.
The person who works his land will have plenty of food.
Evil people want what other evil people have stolen.
Evil people are trapped by their evil talk.
A person will be rewarded for what he says.
A foolish person thinks he is doing right.
A foolish person quickly shows that he is upset.
An honest witness tells the truth.
Careless words stab like a sword.
Truth will last forever.
Those who plan evil mean to lie.
No harm comes to a good person.
The Lord hates those who tell lies.
A wise person keeps what he knows to himself.
Hard workers will become leaders.
Worry makes a person feel as if he is carrying a heavy load.
A good person takes advice from his friends.
A lazy person catches no food to cook.
Doing what is right is the way to life.

13.verse_text: A wise son takes his father"s advice. But a person who makes fun of wisdom won"t listen to correction. But those who can"t be trusted want only violence. But anyone who speaks without thinking will be ruined. But a hard worker gets everything he wants. But wicked people do shameful and disgraceful things. But evil ruins the sinner. Other people pretend to be poor but really are wealthy. But a poor person will never have to face such a danger. But the wicked will die like a flame going out. But those who take advice are wise. But money that is gathered little by little will slowly grow. But when wishes come true, it"s like eating fruit from the tree of life. But whoever does what he is told will be rewarded. It is like a fountain of water that can save people from death. But the lives of those who are not trustworthy are hard. But a foolish person shows how foolish he is. But a trustworthy one makes everything right. But a person who accepts correction will be honored. But foolish people still refuse to stop doing evil. But whoever makes friends with fools will suffer. But good people enjoy success. And a sinner"s wealth will be saved for good people. But unfair people steal it from him. But the person who loves his children is careful to correct them. But the wicked will go hungry.
A person will be rewarded for what he says.
Whoever is careful about what he says protects his life.
The lazy person will not get what he wants.
Good people hate what is false.
Doing what is right protects the honest person.
Some people pretend to be rich but really have nothing.
A rich man may have to pay a ransom for his life.
Good people will live long like bright flames.
Pride leads to arguments.
Money that comes easily disappears quickly.
It is sad when you don"t get what you hoped for.
Whoever rejects what he is taught will pay for it.
The teaching of a wise person gives life.
People with good understanding will be liked.
Every wise person acts with good sense.
A wicked messenger brings nothing but trouble.
A person who refuses correction will end up poor and disgraced.
It is so good when wishes come true.
Whoever spends time with wise people will become wise.

30.verse_text: These are the words of Agur son of Jakeh. This is his message to Ithiel and Ucal: I have no understanding. And I don"t know much about God, the Holy One. Who can hold the wind in his hand? Who can gather up the waters in his coat? Who has decided where the ends of the earth will be? What is his name? And what is his son"s name? Surely, you know! He protects those who come to him for safety. If you do, he will correct you and prove that you are a liar. Don"t refuse me before I die. And don"t make me either rich or poor. Just give me enough food for each day. I might say, "I don"t know the Lord." If I am poor, I might steal. Then I would disgrace the name of my God. If you do, he will curse you, and you will suffer for it. And they do not bless their mothers. But they are not really free from evil. They look down on others. It is as if their jaws are full of knives. They want to remove the poor people from the earth. They want to get rid of the needy. Their names are "Give me. Give me." There are three things that are never satisfied. There are really four that never say, "I"ve had enough!" the land that never gets enough rain, and fire that never says, "I"ve had enough!" Don"t refuse to obey your mother. If you do, your eye will be pecked out by the birds of the valley. You will be eaten by hawks. There are really four that I don"t understand: the way a snake slides over a rock, the way a ship sails on the sea and the way a man acts with a girl. She sins and doesn"t care. She says, "I haven"t done anything wrong." There are really four that it cannot stand: a foolish person who has plenty to eat, and a maid who replaces her mistress. But they are very wise: But they store up food in the summer. But they can live among the rocks. But they all go out in formation. But they are found even in kings" palaces. There are really four that walk as if they are important: They are strong and run from nothing. And so does a king when his army is around him. If you planned evil, cover your mouth. Twisting noses makes them bleed. And stirring up anger makes trouble.'

31.verse_text: These are the words of King Lemuel. This is the message his mother taught him:

'My son, I gave birth to you. You are the son I prayed for. Don"t waste your time on those who ruin kings. Rulers should not desire beer. They might keep the needy from getting their rights. And give wine to those who are sad. Then they won"t remember their misery anymore. Defend the rights of all those who have nothing. Defend the rights of the poor and needy.' She is worth more than rubies. With her, he has everything he needs. for as long as she lives. She likes to work with her hands. She goes far to get food. She prepares food for her family. She also feeds her servant girls. With money she has earned, she plants a vineyard. Her arms are strong. She works by her lamp late into the night. and weaves her own cloth. She helps the needy. They all have fine clothes to keep them warm. Her clothes are made of linen and other expensive material. He makes decisions as one of the leaders of the land. She provides belts to the merchants. She looks forward to the future with joy. And she teaches others to be kind. And she is always busy. Her husband also praises her. but you are better than all of them.' But a woman who respects the Lord should be praised. She should be openly praised for what she has done.
Don"t waste your strength on women.
'Kings should not drink wine, Lemuel.
If they drink, they might forget the law.
Give beer to people who are dying.
Let them drink and forget their need.
'Speak up for those who cannot speak for themselves.
Speak up and judge fairly.
It is hard to find an excellent wife.
Her husband trusts her completely.
She does him good and not harm
She looks for wool and linen.
She is like a trader"s ship.

He says, 'There are many excellent wives,
